# Prova 1
```{r, data_1_load, echo=FALSE}

```

# Random Index Plot

```{r, big_plot, echo=FALSE, fig.width = 12}

plot(RI_1, type = "o", main ="")
plot(RI_2, type = "o", main ="")
plot(RI_3, type = "o", main ="")

```
